titleStmt.title: Three excellent tragœdies. Viz. The raging Turk, or, Bajazet the Second. The courageous Turk, or, Amurath the First. And The tragoedie of Orestes· / Written, by Tho. Goff, Master of Arts, and student of Christ-Church in Oxford; and acted by the students of the same house.
titleStmt.author: Goffe, Thomas, 1591-1629.
Meighen, Richard, fl. 1656.

editionStmt.edition: The second edition, carefully corrected by a friend of the authors.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for G. Bedell and T. Collins, at the middle Temple gate Fleet-street.,

notesStmt.note: "The raging Turk", "The courageous Turk", and "The tragedy of Orestes" each have separate dated title page; pagination and register are continuous.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
